core.summary: A two-hour film where Jesus Christ arrives in modern-day Paris as a disillusioned observer of the contemporary world. The film explores what happens with his powers, featuring a nostalgic tone with bitter and somewhat sad humor.

objectives: Create a two-hour film exploring Jesus Christ's arrival in modern-day Paris as a disillusioned observer.
constraints: Nostalgic tone with bitter and somewhat sad humor
hypotheses: Jesus Christ retains his powers in the modern world

brief.primary_objective: Create a two-hour film exploring Jesus Christ's arrival in modern-day Paris as a disillusioned observer.
